Further Information

Darlington Borough Council is seeking to recruit a Policy and Strategy Officer to join our ambitious and friendly team. This is a rare opportunity to work on strategic priorities for the organisation with services across the Council, giving the successful candidate unique insight into how the Council works.

It is an exciting time for Darlington and the Council has an important role to play. The Policy and Strategy Team is a small team in the corporate centre of the Council, leading the development of the Council Plan and supporting evidence-led decision making on strategic priorities.

This role supports the development of strategy and policy with opportunities to work with the senior executive team, political leadership and key stakeholders. This is the ideal job if you are keen to learn, have an interest in local government and want to make a difference.

The successful candidate will have a good knowledge of the policy development process and understanding of the importance of evidence-based decision-making. We are looking for someone to support the development of policy positions; source and analyse data and intelligence from a range of sources; is well organised with strong attention to detail; and an effective communicator.

This job is a hybrid working position, with the office base in the Town Hall in Darlington town centre. The office is conveniently located in the heart of the town centre and only a short walk from the train station and our key stakeholders.

The rewards for working at Darlington Borough Council go beyond the salary you will receive; we have numerous additional benefits such as:

• 32 days Annual Leave plus Bank Holidays, with option to purchase additional Annual Leave (pro-rata for part time working)

• Access to the Local Government Pension Scheme with option to make Additional Voluntary Contributions

• Flexi-time scheme

• Flexible working

• Generous Maternity, Paternity and Adoption Leave schemes

• Staff equality forums

• Green Car Leasing Scheme

• Access to a wide range of training, learning and development

• Physiotherapy service

• Confidential counselling service

• Great wellbeing offer

• Cycle to Work Scheme

• Dolphin Centre Fit for Life Discounts

• Local and National retailer discounts

• Arriva Employee Travel Club

For the full range of benefits we offer, please see our Why work for us internet page, which also includes our Total Reward Booklet and Employee Benefit Video.
